name: Barren Peak (Game Jam Edition)
description:
A short prototype, about a dryad and her mission to return life to a dying world. Right now, there's just a single tree to help.

Controls: WASD to move, SPACE to jump/doublejump, click to shoot (does nothing useful). Alt + f4 to exit.

Programming: Rick Sanchez, Kuba Krysztofiak, Alexander 'Cappon' Ekblom
Dryad art: Kuba Krysztofiak
Music: lashman

Assets: 2D Platfrom Tile Set - Cave (Iphigenia Pixels), Nature Pixel Art Base Assets FREE (Blackspire), Customizable Skybox (Key Mouse).
